query:
SELECT b.id, b.name, b.status, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hlr_results r WHERE r.batch_id = b.id) as results_count 
FROM hlr_batches b 
ORDER BY b.id DESC 
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3mPXLkQh9ex4hev.143b10ef28f1 --database CTMKJfJD4gB7m3trNQwmdb --execute SELECT b.id, b.name, b.status, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hlr_results r WHERE r.batch_id = b.id) as results_count
